data.title: West Virginia University
data.meta_description: WVU is a family of distinctive campuses united by a single mission: to provide a quality and affordable education. No matter who you are, you’ll find your niche here.
data.text:
International Students

Are you from outside the U.S.? We have resources especially for you. Learn about our location and programs, find answers to common questions and connect with your counselor.

International Student Resources

My most valuable experience [at WVU] would be the relationships I’ve been able to make within the Davis College. I certainly don’t know everyone, but at the same time, I feel as if there aren’t any strangers here. It was the kindred spirit of Davis that convinced me to go on a study abroad trip to Belize with 13 other Davis students, not knowing a single one of them. I came out of it with the most incredible memories and friendships.

Jillian Blair

2024 Environmental and Energy Resources Management graduate from Wheeling, WV
